debug.mtaLoaded: MTA {{ type }} loaded. The size is: {{ size }}.
debug.ui5YamlDoesNotExist: The `ui5.yaml` file does not exist in the project. Create one. Returned error: {{- error }}
debug.mtaCreated: The MTA configuration has been created: {{- mtaPath}}.
debug.mtaSaved: The MTA configuration has been saved.
debug.mtaSavedFailed: Saving the MTA configuration failed with the error: {{- error }}.
debug.addMissingModules: Adding missing modules to MTA configuration...
debug.html5AppAdded: HTML5 application added to MTA configuration: {{- appName}}
debug.html5AlreadyExists: HTML5 application {{- appName}} already exists in the MTA configuration.
debug.addXsuaaService: Adding XSUAA service to MTA configuration.
debug.errorReadingMta: An error occurred when reading the `mta.yaml` file: {{- error }}. Please check the file.
debug.unableToReadPackageJson: Unable to read the `package.json` file: {{- error }}.

error.unableToLoadMTA: Unable to load the `mta.yaml` configuration: {{- mtaDir }}. Returned error: {{- error }}.
error.updatingMTAExtensionFailed: Unable to add the MTA extension configuration to the file: {{mtaExtFilePath}}.
error.cannotFindBinary: Cannot find the "{{bin}}" executable. Please add it to the path or use "npm i -g {{- pkg}}" to install it.
error.mtaExtensionFailed: Unable to create or update the MTA extension file for the API Hub Enterprise destination configuration: {{error}}.
error.serviceKeyFailed: Failed to fetch the service key.
error.missingMtaParameters: Missing required parameters, MTA Path, MTA ID, or the Router type is missing.
error.invalidMtaIdWithChars: The MTA ID can only contain letters, numbers, dashes, periods, and underscores.
error.invalidMtaId: The MTA ID must start with a letter or underscore and be less than 128 characters.
error.missingABAPServiceBindingDetails: Missing ABAP service details for direct service binding.
error.mtaFolderAlreadyExists: A folder with same name already exists in the target directory.
error.mtaAlreadyExists: An `mta.yaml` file already exists in the target directory.
error.cannotUpdateRouterXSApp: Unable to update the router `xs-app.json` welcome location.
error.targetFolderDoesNotExist: The target folder does not exist: {{targetFolder}}. Check the folder has the correct permissions.
error.doesNotContainACapApp: The target folder does not contain a Node.js CAP project. Please ensure the folder contains a Node.js CAP project.
error.errorInstallingNodeModules: An error occurred when installing node modules. Please check the logs.
error.errorGeneratingMtaYaml: An error occurred when creating the mta.yaml file. Please check the logs.

info.existingMTAExtensionNotFound: Cannot find a valid existing MTA extension file. A new one will be created. Error: {{- error}}.
info.existingDestinationNotFound: A destination service resource cannot be found in the `mta.yaml` file. An MTA extension destination instance cannot be added.
info.mtaExtensionCreated: Created file: {{mtaExtFile}} to extend the MTA module: {{appMtaId}} with the destination configuration.
info.mtaExtensionUpdated: Updated file: {{mtaExtFile}} with the module destination configuration.
